subtitle: Rather spicier than your average meat loaf. Eat hot or cold.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion, garlic and curry powder and fry for 2 min or until softened. Stir in the pepper and cook for 1 min.
Remove from heat. Stir in the horseradish, seasoning, breadcrumbs, beef and eggs until well mixed.
Spoon the mixture into a lightly greased and lined 1.15 litre loaf tin. Smooth over the surface. Place the loaf in the oven for 1hr 30 min or until firm to the touch and cooked through.
Remove from oven. Leave to cool slightly before removing from tin. Serve either hot or cold in slices.

title: Curried beef loaf
